comments.content: It's probably called "design". It's "Mix"ed, semi-random logic that somehow fits together. Why not ask Luc, I'm sure he's got a better idea than most as to the logic of it.

Also interesting would be to unravel the logic behind the semi-serifs in Rotis - since according to Aicher's "Typographie" logic was indeed used. Shame he's dead - he was da man.
